      • worldToIsoLeft

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 worldToIsoLeft(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 worldCoords,
                                                           float tileWidthHalf,
                                                           float tileHeightHalf,
                                                           int mapHeight,
                                                           float yOffset)
        Projects world coordinates into isometric coordinates through the solution of a triangle.
        Parameters:
        worldCoords - The position in world coordinates
        tileWidthHalf - Half the width of the tiles, in world coordinates
        tileHeightHalf - Half the height of the tiles, in world coordinates
        yOffset - The offset on the world y-axis between the world's origin and the layer's grid origin
        mapHeight - Height of the map.
        Returns:
        The coordinate corresponding to the position of the cell in the isometric coordinate system (top -> down)

        tileWidthHalf - Half the width of the tiles, in world coordinates
        tileHeightHalf - Half the height of the tiles, in world coordinates
        yOffset - The offset on the world y-axis between the world's origin and the layer's grid origin

      • isoToWorld

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 isoToWorld(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 isoCoords,
                                                float tileWidthHalf,
                                                float tileHeightHalf,
                                                int mapHeight,
                                                float yOffset)
        Projects world coordinates into isometric coordinates through the solution of a triangle.
        Parameters:
        isoCoords - The position in the isometric coordinate system (top -> down)
        tileWidthHalf - Half the width of the tiles, in world coordinates
        tileHeightHalf - Half the height of the tiles, in world coordinates
        yOffset - The offset on the world y-axis between the world's origin and the layer's grid origin.
        mapHeight - Height of the map.
        Returns:
        The coordinate corresponding to the position of the cell's center in the world coordinate system

      • worldToIsoAlternate

        @Deprecated
public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 worldToIsoAlternate(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 worldCoords,
                                                                             float mapUnit,
                                                                             float yOffset)
        Deprecated. 
        Projects world coordinates into isometric coordinates through the solution of a triangle.
        Parameters:
        worldCoords - The position in world coordinates
        mapUnit - The shared norm of the unit vectors associated with the axes
        yOffset - The offset on the world y-axis between the world's origin and the layer's grid origin
        Returns:
        The coordinate corresponding to the position of the cell in the isometric coordinate system
